author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Not sure if the eyeball became obsolete because of the lack of windows in modern warships or the other way around.

author: Peter Wright
content: Whatever happened to the Mk1 eyeball? It was cheap, plentiful and connected to a supercomputer. It saved many millions in its time but I hear was pensioned off as unreliable.

author: Willy
content: Sigh, such an interesting time we live in.

author: DAVID RYE
content: A fair summing up from the American perspective, thank you Rick.
